name: Dungeons and Female Teachers
description: After clearing the level and hitting monsters in another world, you will get gold coins, which you can use to upgrade your weapons, making it easier for you to fight monsters. It can also be used to buy clothes and shoes to make your character more beautiful. It should be noted that you are a mortal body, your blood volume will never increase, and as the level goes further, the monster damage value will become higher and higher. If you can't beat it, please upgrade your weapon in time. If you don't have enough gold coins, you can Play the levels you can beat first.
